Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2008 07:53PM wakebrat7 wrote: I say trim it super short before you lose it.  Reason being is that when my hair fell out, it hurt so bad, not to mention all the disgusting hair all over the place.  What I did was this.  A week before chemo I cut my hair to my shoulders.  Then a couple of days later a little shorter, then a couple of days after that, a little shorter.  I did that so I could get used to the short hair.  Its hard to shave off long hair.  You have to cut it first anyways.  Good luck with everything.  Some day this will all seem like a bad dream, believe me.  I am 3 years out and I have all my hair back and its like it never happened.   Blessings, L.
